00035 // constants/macros/typdefs
00036 #define LIS3L02_I2C_ADDR                0x3A    
00037 
00038 // LIS3L02 register address defines
00039 #define LIS3L02_REG_OFFSETX             0x16    
00040 #define LIS3L02_REG_OFFSETY             0x17    
00041 #define LIS3L02_REG_OFFSETZ             0x18    
00042 #define LIS3L02_REG_GAINX               0x19    
00043 #define LIS3L02_REG_GAINY               0x1A    
00044 #define LIS3L02_REG_GAINZ               0x1B    
00045 #define LIS3L02_REG_CTRLREG1    0x20    
00046 #define LIS3L02_REG_CTRLREG2    0x21    
00047 #define LIS3L02_REG_WAKEUPCFG   0x23    
00048 #define LIS3L02_REG_WAKEUPSRC   0x24    
00049 #define LIS3L02_REG_WAKEUPACK   0x25    
00050 #define LIS3L02_REG_STATUS              0x27    
00051 #define LIS3L02_REG_OUTXL               0x28    
00052 #define LIS3L02_REG_OUTXH               0x29    
00053 #define LIS3L02_REG_OUTYL               0x2A    
00054 #define LIS3L02_REG_OUTYH               0x2B    
00055 #define LIS3L02_REG_OUTZL               0x2C    
00056 #define LIS3L02_REG_OUTZH               0x2D    
00057 #define LIS3L02_REG_THSL                0x2E    
00058 #define LIS3L02_REG_THSH                0x2F    
00059 #define LIS3L02_REG_MULTIREAD   0x80    
00060 
00061 // LIS3L02 control register 1 bit defines
00062 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_XEN    0x01    
00063 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_YEN    0x02    
00064 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_ZEN    0x04    
00065 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_ST             0x08    
00066 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_DF0    0x10    
00067 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_DF1    0x20    
00068 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_PD0    0x40    
00069 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG1_PD1    0x80    
00070 
00071 // LIS3L02 control register 2 bit defines
00072 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG2_DAS    0x01    
00073 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG2_SIM    0x02    
00074 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG2_DRDY   0x04    
00075 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG2_IEN    0x08    
00076 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG2_BOOT   0x10    
00077 #define LIS3L02_CTRLREG2_FS             0x80    
00078 
00079 // LIS3L02 WAKEUPCFG register bit defines
00080 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_MXL   0x01    
00081 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_MXH   0x02    
00082 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_MYL   0x04    
00083 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_MYH   0x08    
00084 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_MZL   0x10    
00085 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_MZH   0x20    
00086 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPCFG_LIR   0x40    
00087 
00088 // LIS3L02 WAKEUPSRC register bit defines
00089 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_XL    0x01    
00090 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_XH    0x02    
00091 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_YL    0x04    
00092 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_YH    0x08    
00093 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_ZL    0x10    
00094 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_ZH    0x20    
00095 #define LIS3L02_WAKEUPSRC_IA    0x40    
00096 
00097 // LIS3L02 WAKEUPSRC register bit defines
00098 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_XDA              0x01    
00099 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_YDA              0x02    
00100 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_ZDA              0x04    
00101 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_ZYXDA    0x08    
00102 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_XOR              0x10    
00103 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_YOR              0x20    
00104 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_ZOR              0x40    
00105 #define LIS3L02_STATUS_ZYXOR    0x80
